content: वादिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [वद्-णिनि] {@--1@} Speaking, talking, discoursing. {@--2@} Asserting. {@--3@} Disputing. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A speaker. {@--2@} A disputant, an antagonist; तस्यांगीकरणेन वादिन इव स्यात्स्वामिनो निग्रहः <ls>Mu. 5. 10</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 92.</ls> {@--3@} An accuser, a plaintiff. {@--4@} An expounder, a teacher. {@--5@} (In music) The leading or key-note.
